column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType

#Text=Main Bolin Bumi Korra Kya Mako Tenzin Antagonists Dark spirits Unavaatu says : " Minor Asami Sato Desna and Eska Ikki Iroh Jinora Lin Beifong Meelo Pema Raiko Varrick Zhu Li " Shiro Shinobi says : " Korra and Mako have discovered the truth about Amon 's identity .
#Text=Bolin , once we get down there , I need you to tear up those runways .
#Text=We ca n't let those aircraft take off .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Aye aye , captain !
#Text=Ooh , general , general .
#Text=All right , you guys wait here until we get back , okay ?
#Text=Uh - uh , stay .
#Text=" Asami says : " Why would there be fence posts but no fence ?
#Text=" Amon says : " Thank you all for joining me on this historic occasion !
#Text=When I was a boy , a firebender struck down my entire family and left me scarred .
#Text=That tragic event began my quest to equalize the world .
#Text=" Korra says : " That 's a lie , Amon !
#Text=Or should I call you Noatak ?
#Text=" Lieutenant says : " You want her taken out ?
#Text=" Amon says : " No .
#Text=Everyone calm down , we have nothing to fear from the Avatar .
#Text=Let 's hear what she has to say .
#Text=" Korra says : " Amon has been lying to you .
#Text=The spirits did n't give him the power to take people 's bending away .
#Text=He uses bloodbending to do it .
#Text=Amon is a waterbender !
#Text=" Lieutenant says : " What is this nonsense ?
#Text=" Amon says : " You 're desperate , Avatar .
#Text=Making up stories about me is a pathetic last resort .
#Text=" Korra says : " Your family was n't killed by a firebender .
#Text=His father was Yakone , and his brother ... is Councilman Tarrlok .
#Text=" Amon says : " Hmph , an amusing tale , but I will show you the truth .
#Text=This is what a firebender did to me .
#Text=" Korra says : " What ?
#Text=" Equalist supporter says : " The Avatar is lying !
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm telling you !
#Text=He 's a waterbender .
#Text=They do n't believe me .
#Text=It did n't work !
#Text=" Mako says : " We said what we had to .
#Text=Let 's get out of here .
#Text=" Amon says : " I would n't leave yet , Avatar .
#Text=You 'll miss the main event .
#Text=" Korra says : " No ... they got away .
#Text=We saw them get away !
#Text="
